section.heading: RPP exclusion.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-230: § 301 of D.C. Law 23-230 provided that the creation of this section by § 201 of D.C. Law 23-230 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-230: § 301 of D.C. Law 23-230 provided that the creation of this section by § 201 of D.C. Law 23-230 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
Section 7004 of D.C. Law 25-50 repealed §§ 201 and 301 of D.C. Law 23-182 including the applicability provisions impacting this section.
